title: [Pytorch] wrong computation of softmin
body_html:
Code example

torch.nn.functional.softmin(torch.arange(2).float(), dim=0)
output tensor([-0.2689, -0.7311])

Error is in priorities (minus applied after softmax):

if dim is None:
        dim = _get_softmax_dim('softmin', input.dim(), _stacklevel)
return -input.softmax(dim) # minus here comes after softmax

body:
## Code example

```python
torch.nn.functional.softmin(torch.arange(2).float(), dim=0)
output tensor([-0.2689, -0.7311])
```

Error is in priorities (minus applied after softmax):
```
if dim is None:
        dim = _get_softmax_dim('softmin', input.dim(), _stacklevel)
return -input.softmax(dim) # minus here comes after softmax
```
